parameters.name: initialValue
parameters.description: The starting value for both state versions.

parameters.name: options.delay
parameters.description: Inactivity period in milliseconds before updating the debounced value.

returnValues.name: value
returnValues.description: The current, inmediate state (use for controlled inputs).

returnValues.name: debouncedValue
returnValues.description: The delayed state (use for effects or API calls).

returnValues.name: setValue
returnValues.description: Standard React state setter for the inmediate value.
